brandHighlight.data:
The oldest registered distillery in the United States is home to the world's best-selling individual whiskey brand. 

Jack Daniel’s, the best-selling individual whiskey brand in the world, was originally crafted by Jack Daniel himself. Jack Daniel’s premium Tennessee whiskey is still made using iron-free cave spring water, and is charcoal-mellowed and matured at America’s oldest registered distillery, established in 1866 in Lynchburg, Tennessee.

description.data: Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey and Cola delivers a ready to drink whiskey cocktail that features one of the world's best selling whiskies with a twist. Perfectly pre-mixed, this canned drink combines Jack Daniel's Old No. 7 with fizzy cola for a refreshingly all-time classic mixed drink. You can enjoy the convenient format of these Jack and Cola whiskey cocktails on the go, straight from the fridge, or right out of the cooler. Simply serve it cold straight from the can or over ice, and always in good company. Add these Jack and Cola canned cocktails to your cooler alongside beer and hard seltzer. If you want a whiskey cocktail ready to go, Jack Daniel’s has you covered. Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey and Cola is real Jack that's ready to go whenever you are. Live Freely. Drink Responsibly.

namePublicLong.data: Jack Daniel's and Cola Ready to Drink, 355 mL Can, 4-Pack, 14 Proof

advices.data: You can't beat the convenience; just pop the cap and enjoy a fresh take on your favorite Tennessee whiskey.

description.data: NUTRL Lemonade Vodka Seltzer is an easy-to-drink hard seltzer that combines vodka with a delicious lemon twist. This spiked seltzer variety pack includes flavored hard seltzers of classic lemonade, blackberry lemonade, strawberry lemonade, and peach lemonade. These alcoholic beverages are made with refreshingly simple, tasty and uncomplicated ingredients like vodka, seltzer water, and real fruit juice. It combines the slightly sweet and pleasantly tart taste of lemonade with the light and refreshing taste of vodka seltzer. NUTRL Vodka Seltzer fruit drinks are gluten free with natural flavors and 100 calories. These gluten free alcohol drinks have a 4.5% ABV and can be enjoyed cold or over ice right out of the can. No matter how you prefer it, each canned lemonade seltzer flavor is down right delicious, and the slim cans of NUTRL seltzer are easy to hold, store and transport wherever the party goes whether you need crisp alcohol beverages or simple spiked lemonade drinks that can be enjoyed year-round, no matter the season. Real Juice. Enjoy NUTRL Responsibly.

description.data: Culinary-crafted cocktail. Inspired by the Sun, Surf & Beaches of Dogfish Head’s seaside home, we’ve crafted our uber-refreshing and unique take on this regionally dominant drink: the Crush Cocktail. Our off-centered twist is both citrus-forward and CRUSH-able.  Built on our bright and citrusy gin, then blended with lemon & lime juice. Citrus & herbaceous, a real palate cleansing refresher!

text.data:
7% ABV
Gin Refresher. Two full proof shots in every can.
Special Ingredients: Citrusy gin with lemon and lime juice.
Botanical and refreshing.  The botanicals mingle delightfully with the tart citrus fruit.  There is also a touch of sweetness to balance the spices and tart fruit.
Food pairings: Grilled chicken, Italian food with marinara sauce, Pizza , Cannoli.

brandHighlight.data: Creating the finest gin possible takes the highest quality raw ingredients. At the BOMBAY Laverstoke Mill distillery, we use up to 12 precious botanicals suspended above the spirit in perforated copper baskets during distillation. brandHighlight.data:
GREY GOOSE Vodka is created in France, a country renowned for its craftsmanship, epicurean traditions and spirit-making heritage. The French have a deeply ingrained culture of terroir - identifying the ideal combination of quality food and drink ingredients with people, process and place. Therefore, they have an innate understanding of how to get the best out of the best. Francois Thibault, the creator of GREY GOOSE, was inspired by his training as a Cognac cellar master and created a vodka designed to express the true taste and character of the ingredients. Francois still oversees every step of the unique journey from field to bottle.
GREY GOOSE Vodka is 100% traceable from crop to cork. Every step, from harvest to milling to distillation to bottling, using the traditions of the Maitre de Chai. Some of our farmers have worked the land going back 11 generations. Only two ingredients are used: single-origin Picardie winter wheat and natural spring water.  The inside of every bottle is washed once with GREY GOOSE, so it’s the only liquid ever touching the bottle.

Skillfully pre mixed drinks with a smooth, refreshing and perfectly well-balanced taste

brandHighlight.data: Crown Royal was born as a gift King George VI and Queen Elizabeth of England in 1939 to honor their royal visit to Canada. 600 blends were trialed before settling on the final exceptionally smooth blend of roughly 50 whiskies which was presented in a cut-glass decanter in a regal purple bag with gold stitching. Crown Royal was released in the United States in the 1960s and has since become the top selling Canadian whisky. To this day, every drop of Crown Royal is crafted to meet the same uncompromising standards, making it, to many discerning palates, the finest whisky of all.

description.data: Enjoy a royally delicious cocktail in a ready-to-drink can with Crown Royal Peach Tea Canadian Whisky Cocktail. Featuring the signature smoothness of traditional Crown Royal Whisky combined with the sweet flavor of fresh peaches, this cocktail offers an effortlessly delicious way to relax or celebrate. For a refreshing tasting cocktail, simply pour in a glass with ice and garnish with a peach slice. Crown Royal Peach Tea earned a gold medal at the 2021 San Francisco World Spirits Competition. Includes one 7% alc./vol. 12 fl oz can of Peach Tea Canadian Whisky Cocktail. Please drink responsibly.

brandHighlight.data: While Smirnoff had its beginnings in Russia - Vladimir Smirnoff in fact fled from Russia during the Revolution and re-established the brand in Europe more than a century ago. We’ve been in America since 1934 and are fully owned by Diageo (a British company). It has become a truly global brand, enjoyed by millions in America, and is made with pride in Plainfield, Illinois. And also around the world in Canada, Great Britain, Italy, Australia, Jamaica, Brazil, Argentina, India, Indonesia, and Kenya.

description.data:
Introducing the Smirnoff SMASH Vodka Soda, the perfect ready-to-drink cocktail for your next party and get-together. This new vodka soda variety pack combines two fruity flavors for a smashing taste experience that stands out from the crowd. Unlike other vodka sodas that can lack big taste, Smirnoff SMASH Vodka Soda ready-to-drink cans have the perfect mix of real juice, natural flavors and real, triple-distilled Smirnoff Vodka, topped off with a splash of soda, promising a big taste unlike any other vodka soda.
The 8-pack variety pack includes four mouthwatering flavors: Strawberry Dragon Fruit, Watermelon Lime, Raspberry Peach, and Pineapple Orange. From the flavors of sweet, ripe strawberries paired with juicy dragon fruit, to the refreshing-tasting blend of watermelon and lime - every flavor offers a unique lip-smacking taste.
With only 100 calories per can, no added sugar, and gluten-free, it's a guilt-free indulgence you can enjoy. This 8-pack variety pack is guaranteed to be a SMASH at your next party. After all, two fruits are always better than one. So why wait? Unleash the fun with Smirnoff SMASH Vodka Soda! Please enjoy responsibly.

tastingNotesText.data: Flavors of fresh Strawberry Dragon Fruit, juicy Watermelon Lime, jammy Raspberry Peach, zesty Pineapple Orange

brandHighlight.data:
We’ve been here since the beginning,
Bloomsbury-born, at the heart of the explosive London gin scene.

When Charles Tanqueray first pursued the definitive London
Dry gin, he experimented with some 300 recipes to arrive at one.
The one.

His vision has become legacy and Tanqueray has been 
at the heart of the best parties ever since.

From Tanqueray No. Ten, to our blossoming family of gins,
everything we do today lives up to Charles’ founding vision,
driving us with the momentum and inimitable spirit that first
ignited Tanqueray over 180 years ago.

text.data: READY TO GO: Enjoy the flavors of a Jameson mixed cocktail in a ready to go style; a perfectly mixed ginger line cocktail chilled in a can
ENJOY RESPONSIBLY: Each 355 ml pack of Jameson Ginger and Lime is 10 proof, 5% ABV; Drink Responsibly
CONSUMPTION TIP: Enjoy this hard cocktail chilled, straight from the can wherever you go
BODY & TASTE: Refreshing and crisp, with a cereal grains, toasted oak, and sweet lemon meringue taste

Jameson Ginger & Lime in a can is a convenient & easy way to enjoy our signature Jameson cocktail. Ginger complements the smooth taste of Jameson giving way to a balance of vanilla sweetness & peppery spice, with a signature smooth finish. Enjoyed chilled from the can.

John Jameson founded his distillery in Dublin in 1780 to realize his ambition of making the highest quality whiskey possible. Today Jameson is still made in our Single Distillery in Midleton, Co Cork, Ireland following our founder's tradition of using the finest ingredients and triple distillation to achieve our signature smoothness. Our chilled can collection is inspired by the best Jameson cocktails. Made with natural flavors and the perfect balance of Irish Whiskey, the result is a fresh, bubbly and consistent taste with the convenience to take on-the-go!

description.data:
Looking for answers?
What does it taste like?
Seltzer.
Does it taste like seltzer or beer?
Seltzer.
Is there any Bud Light in it?
No.
But can I drink it when I’d typically drink Bud Light?
Yes.
Like, can I drink it at a tailgate?
Yes.
In my garage?
Yes.
At 40.696252, -76.235543?
If you do, take a picture.
Would it be weird to have it at a BBQ?
No.
Is it gluten free?
Yes.
Also, what's a gluten?
Good question.
Is it for non-beer people?
Yes.
Is it only for non-beer people?
No.
Is buying a Bud Light Seltzer Mango as exciting as it sounds?
Maybe.
How many should I buy?
How many can you carry?
Does it turn my beer fridge into a seltzer fridge?
A true philosophical quandary.
Is it still okay to say dilly dilly?
We'll get back to you on that.

description.data: Itz Spritz is a flavorful cocktail spritzer crafted with simple, natural ingredients. Cocktail inspired and bursting with flavor, Itz Spritz is clean, bright and nothing less than delicious. Itz Spritz is gluten free, lightly sparkling and contains nothing artificial. Compared to a hard seltzer, Itz Spritz is more flavorful and less carbonated, but just as refreshing. Itz Spritz Golden Pear Cocktail Spritzer is ripe, juicy and bright with a touch of honey. Unique sugarcane process: Our malt-free brewing process makes Itz Spritz naturally gluten free and fresh tasting from the start. 5 simple ingredients: We blend the finest natural ingredients to create the perfect fusion of unique flavors. Effervescent fun: The lightly sparkling effervescence of a classic spritz, crafted in a slim can. Itz perfected for you. Enjoy Itz Spritz straight from the can, poured over ice or as part of your favorite cocktail. Contains 4.2% ABV. Voted #1 Best Tasting Brewed Seltzer, 2019 Fizz Fight National Seltzer Competition. Itz Spritz also received top honors from the Beverage Tasting Institute, scoring exclusively gold and silver. Cheers to you for making a better choice! We are a female-founded and owned company who wanted to create products inspired by our favorite cocktails – ones that not only taste delicious, but are stylish too. Our mantra? Life is better when you’re having a spritz. Please drink responsibly. © Crafted by Vivify Beverages, La Crosse, WI 54601

description.data: Inspired by gourmet Italian sodas and bursting with sun-ripened citrus flavor, Bravazzi dazzles with its naturally sweet, fizzy essence and fragrant aroma. We craft Bravazzi using only simple, clean, fresh ingredients for a bright, bubbly finish that’s truly delizioso. Bravazzi is totally natural and 100% gluten free, but it's much more flavorful than a hard seltzer because we add real fruit juice. Bravazzi Hard Italian Soda Variety Pack contains four refreshing flavors - Blood Orange, Grapefruit, Limonata and Clementina. Blended with real fruit juice: Naturally sweet from the start. A new kind of brew: Our unique cane sugar brewing process makes Bravazzi light tasting and naturally gluten free—so fresh flavor always shines through. Perfected for you: With a touch of bubbles, the finish is light, bright and totally delicious. Enjoy Bravazzi straight from the can, poured over ice or as part of your favorite cocktail. Contains 4.2% ABV. Bravazzi received top honors from the Beverage Tasting Institute, scoring exclusively gold and silver. Our founders created Bravazzi after falling in love with Italian sodas during their travels and studies in Italy. Bravazzi is majority female founded and owned. Please drink responsibly. © Crafted by Vivify Beverages, La Crosse, WI 54601

description.data: Itz Spritz is a flavorful cocktail spritzer crafted with simple, natural ingredients. Cocktail inspired and bursting with flavor, Itz Spritz is clean, bright and nothing less than delicious. Itz Spritz is gluten free, lightly sparkling and contains nothing artificial. Compared to a hard seltzer, Itz Spritz is more flavorful and less carbonated, but just as refreshing. Itz Spritz Elderflower Citrus Cocktail Spritzer is fresh, fragrant and delicate with a splash of lemon. Unique sugarcane process: Our malt-free brewing process makes Itz Spritz naturally gluten free and fresh tasting from the start. 5 simple ingredients: We blend the finest natural ingredients to create the perfect fusion of unique flavors. Effervescent fun: The lightly sparkling effervescence of a classic spritz, crafted in a slim can. Itz perfected for you. Enjoy Itz Spritz straight from the can, poured over ice or as part of your favorite cocktail. Contains 4.2% ABV. Voted #1 Best Tasting Brewed Seltzer, 2019 Fizz Fight National Seltzer Competition. Itz Spritz also received top honors from the Beverage Tasting Institute, scoring exclusively gold and silver. Cheers to you for making a better choice! We are a female-founded and owned company who wanted to create products inspired by our favorite cocktails – ones that not only taste delicious, but are stylish too. Our mantra? Life is better when you’re having a spritz. Please drink responsibly. © Crafted by Vivify Beverages, La Crosse, WI 54601

brandHighlight.data: Corona beer’s international expansion began in the South and Southwestern regions of the United States — with American tourists returning home from Mexico, bringing with them a taste for the beer they had enjoyed on the sunny beaches of Acapulco and Puerto Vallarta. Corona Extra was introduced to the U.S. in 1979, and the Corona brand quickly became synonymous with the American beach-and-barbecue lifestyle. Since then, Corona has added a few more drinks to kick back with, providing additional choices for everyone who already is living La Vida Más Fina. Fresh and tropical, Corona Refresca is a light and sweet (but not *too* sweet) alternative beverage alcohol product for a different category of beer drinkers. description.data: Corona Refresca Passionfruit Lime Spiked Tropical Cocktail is a premium flavored malt beverage. Taste the tropics of Mexico with the vibrant, refreshing, and natural lime and passionfruit flavors of these sweet drinks. With fewer than 200 calories* per slim can, the flavorful tropical cocktails in this canned drinks 6 pack are made with malt grains and brewed with minimal fermentation. Each sip of these flavored drinks delivers a crisp finish that is especially enjoyable on a hot day. Available in a six pack, these passionfruit lime drinks are perfect served at a backyard barbecue or poured into tropical cocktail glasses to enjoy with a special meal. Another premium offering from the Corona beer family, Corona Refresca is a tropical celebration you can taste. *Per 12 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 184, Carbs 22.8 grams, Protein 0.1 grams, Fat 0.0 grams. brandHighlight.data: Corona beer’s international expansion began in the South and Southwestern regions of the United States — with American tourists returning home from Mexico, bringing with them a taste for the beer they had enjoyed on the sunny beaches of Acapulco and Puerto Vallarta. Corona Extra was introduced to the U.S. in 1979, and the Corona brand quickly became synonymous with the American beach-and-barbecue lifestyle. Since then, Corona has added a few more drinks to kick back with, providing additional choices for everyone who already is living La Vida Más Fina. But the story doesn't end here; the Corona brand is just getting started. Fresh and tropical, Corona Refresca is a light and sweet (but not *too* sweet) alternative beverage alcohol product for a different category of beer drinkers. Available in a variety of refreshing flavors, Corona Refresca doesn’t sweep you away to the tropics; it is a flavorful tropical cocktail that brings the taste of the tropics from Mexico to you.

description.data: Corona Refresca Guava Lime Spiked Tropical Cocktail is a premium flavored malt beverage. Taste the tropics of Mexico with the vibrant, refreshing, and natural lime and guava flavors of these sweet drinks. With fewer than 200 calories* per slim can, the flavorful tropical cocktails in this canned drinks 6 pack are made with malt grains and brewed with minimal fermentation. Each sip of these flavored drinks delivers a crisp finish that is especially enjoyable on a hot day. Available in a six pack, these guava lime drinks are perfect served at a backyard barbecue or poured into tropical cocktail glasses to enjoy with a special meal. Another premium offering from the Corona beer family, Corona Refresca is a tropical celebration you can taste. *Per 12 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 187, Carbs 23.6 grams, Protein 0.1 grams, Fat 0.0 grams. Relax responsibly®. Corona Refresca™ Malt Beverage with Natural Flavors and Certified Colors.  Imported by Crown Imports, Chicago, IL.

description.data: Itz Spritz is a flavorful cocktail spritzer crafted with simple, natural ingredients. Cocktail inspired and bursting with flavor, Itz Spritz is clean, bright and nothing less than delicious. Itz Spritz is gluten free, lightly sparkling and contains nothing artificial. Compared to a hard seltzer, Itz Spritz is more flavorful and less carbonated. Itz Spritz Cucumber Lime Twist Cocktail Spritzer is crisp, refreshing and clean with a hint of mint. Unique sugarcane process: Our malt-free brewing process makes Itz Spritz naturally gluten free and fresh tasting from the start. 5 simple ingredients: We blend the finest natural ingredients to create the perfect fusion of unique flavors. Effervescent fun: The lightly sparkling effervescence of a classic spritz, crafted in a slim can. Itz perfected for you. Enjoy Itz Spritz straight from the can, poured over ice or as part of your favorite cocktail. Contains 4.2% ABV. Voted #1 Best Tasting Brewed Seltzer, 2019 Fizz Fight National Seltzer Competition. Itz Spritz also received top honors from the Beverage Tasting Institute, scoring exclusively gold and silver. Cheers to you for making a better choice! We are a female-founded and owned company who wanted to create products inspired by our favorite cocktails – ones that not only taste delicious, but are stylish too. Our mantra? Life is better when you’re having a spritz. Please drink responsibly. © Crafted by Vivify Beverages, La Crosse, WI 54601

description.data: Inspired by gourmet Italian sodas and bursting with sun-ripened citrus flavor, Bravazzi dazzles with its naturally sweet, fizzy essence and fragrant aroma. We craft Bravazzi using only simple, clean, fresh ingredients for a bright, bubbly finish that’s truly delizioso. Bravazzi is totally natural and 100% gluten free, but it's much more flavorful than a hard seltzer because we add real fruit juice. Bravazzi Blood Orange Hard Italian Soda is distinctly bold, yet delightfully sweet and refreshing. Blended with real fruit juice: Naturally sweet from the start. A new kind of brew: Our unique cane sugar brewing process makes Bravazzi light tasting and naturally gluten free—so fresh flavor always shines through. Perfected for you: With a touch of bubbles, the finish is light, bright and totally delicious. Enjoy Bravazzi straight from the can, poured over ice or as part of your favorite cocktail. Contains 4.2% ABV. Bravazzi received top honors from the Beverage Tasting Institute, scoring exclusively gold and silver. Our founders created Bravazzi after falling in love with Italian sodas during their travels and studies in Italy. Bravazzi is majority female founded and owned. Please drink responsibly. © Crafted by Vivify Beverages, La Crosse, WI 54601

brandHighlight.data: Corona beer’s international expansion began in the South and Southwestern regions of the United States — with American tourists returning home from Mexico, bringing with them a taste for the beer they had enjoyed on the sunny beaches of Acapulco and Puerto Vallarta. Corona Extra was introduced to the U.S. in 1979, and the Corona brand quickly became synonymous with the American beach-and-barbecue lifestyle. Since then, Corona has added a few more drinks to kick back with, providing additional choices for everyone who already is living La Vida Más Fina. But the story doesn't end here; the Corona brand is just getting started. Corona's take on the undeniable appeal of spiked seltzer, Corona Hard Seltzer is bright and effervescent. Available in a selection of refreshing flavors, Corona Hard Seltzer spiked sparkling water is made to be enjoyed in one place and one place only — the moment.

description.data: A tasty spiked seltzer water that is bright yet sessionable, Corona Hard Seltzer Limonada is an alcoholic sparkling water inspired by traditional Mexican limonada recipes. Experience this lightly fruit-flavored seltzer water that invites you to enjoy the moment, offering a day-at-the-beach feeling wherever you happen to be. A canned seltzer made with natural flavors and a splash of real lemon and Mexican lime juices and sweetened with real cane sugar, this gluten-free* Corona beverage is available in a seltzer variety pack of four refreshing flavors, including Classic Lemon Lime, Strawberry, Watermelon, and Grapefruit. With this delightful twist on lemonade hard seltzer from the makers of Corona Extra Beer, you can enjoy a citrusy grapefruit or lemon lime hard seltzer at the pool, a watermelon seltzer at the beach, or a strawberry seltzer with friends. Bright flavors meet beach vibes with Corona Hard Seltzer. *Per 12 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 100, Carbs 3 grams, Protein 0 grams, Fat 0 grams. Relax responsibly®. Corona® Hard Seltzer Limonada.  Hard Seltzer with Natural Flavors and a Splash of Real Juice.  Imported by Crown Imports, Chicago, IL.

description.data: Ahora ("ah-OR-ah") Tequila Seltzer is made with tequila blanco from Mexico, real fruit juice, crisp seltzer water, and a hint of agave for just a touch of sweetness. Perfectly balanced, this mango tequila hard seltzer combines the excitement of tequila with crisp and bubbly seltzer, offering a delicious drink experience. With 6% alcohol by volume, 130 calories, and 3g of sugar per can, it's the perfect drink for anywhere, anytime – like ahora (that means "now"). Drink Responsibly. description.data: BON V!V Pear Elderflower Spiked Seltzer doesn't make you compromise when it comes to a refreshing, flavorful hard seltzer option. To create a light, refreshing taste, these hard seltzers contain only simple, select ingredients, including purified water, champagne yeast and natural fruit flavor. With no barley or wheat, this flavored seltzer is totally gluten free and has a 4.5% ABV. BON V!V alcoholic drinks have 0 grams of sugar and 90 calories perfect, without sacrificing flavor so you can have your drink and enjoy it too. This sparkling pear elderflower drink comes in slim seltzer cans for easy handling. Enjoy these crisp zero sugar drinks with brunch or create your own happy hour with alcohol drinks at home any night.

brandHighlight.data:
The oldest registered distillery in the United States is home to the world's best-selling individual whiskey brand. 

Jack Daniel’s, the best-selling individual whiskey brand in the world, was originally crafted by Jack Daniel himself. Jack Daniel’s premium Tennessee whiskey is still made using iron-free cave spring water, and is charcoal-mellowed and matured at America’s oldest registered distillery, established in 1866 in Lynchburg, Tennessee.

description.data: Downhome Punch is a masterful flavor combination of classic Jack Daniels with a sweet and sour punch. The sweet tastes of peach, cherry, and orange are blended together to create a tasty drink worthy of Southern hospitality. Jack Daniel’s Country Cocktails are the perfect way to enjoy your favorite Jack Daniel’s beverage in ten convenient ounces. Inspired by over 150 years of premium craft tradition, Country Cocktails are a refreshing new take on classic Jack flavors.

namePublicLong.data: Jack Daniel's Country Cocktails Downhome Punch Malt Beverage, 10 oz Bottle 6-pk, 9.6 Proof

advices.data: You can't beat the convenience; just pop the cap and enjoy a fresh take on your favorite Tennessee whiskey.

John Jameson founded his distillery in Dublin in 1780 to realize his ambition of making the highest quality whiskey possible. Today Jameson is still made in our Single Distillery in Midleton, Co Cork, Ireland following our founder's tradition of using the finest ingredients and triple distillation to achieve our signature smoothness. Our chilled can collection is inspired by the best Jameson cocktails. Made with natural flavors and the perfect balance of Irish Whiskey, the result is a fresh, bubbly and consistent taste with the convenience to take on-the-go!

Made with 100% Arabica cold brew coffee, Kahlúa coffee liqueur and a splash of rum, our Nitro Cold Brew ready-to-drink, with 80 calories per can. Smooth, creamy and cooling, with hints of caramel, vanilla and chocolate—the foam gives the liquid an intense and unforgettable creaminess.

We've all had those evenings when your friend Steve enthusiastically cries out "Let's open a bar!". The day after though, you return to your day job. The story of Kahlúa begins in 1936 when four men all said "screw that day job" and actually went with it. One of the guys had a great idea, two of them forked out rich and tasteful arabica coffee, the fourth was a chemist who turned the idea into reality. Kahlúa is crafted from the finest ingredients that grows side by side in rural Veracruz, Mexico. The actual word Kahlúa has ties to ancient arabic languages and is said to be slang for coffee. Yes, there was already street lingo in the 30's. Kahlúa is not just a regular coffee liqueur brand; it’s a brand with a pretty random but exciting history. And that's because we keep on saying "screw it and let's do it" to things that are worth trying. so... Enjoy our great classic drinks. Because we all know, a good story never starts with salad. Cheers!

brandHighlight.data: In 1922 in Arandas, Mexico, Don Jose Maria Bañuelos looked out his window at the rolling hills of blue agave. What he saw, amidst the red clay and tall blue agave, was a deer, standing bravely in the center of the field. Something about the prideful, confident beauty of the stag struck a nerve with Don Jose - it was the perfect symbol for his new recipe for a smooth yet bold, highland tequila. Naturally, that tequila was named CAZADORES - or, the hunters.

brandHighlight.data: In 1922 in Arandas, Mexico, Don Jose Maria Bañuelos looked out his window at the rolling hills of blue agave. What he saw, amidst the red clay and tall blue agave, was a deer, standing bravely in the center of the field. Something about the prideful, confident beauty of the stag struck a nerve with Don Jose - it was the perfect symbol for his new recipe for a smooth yet bold, highland tequila. Naturally, that tequila was named CAZADORES - or, the hunters.

One family - over 150 years of rum-making expertise.

description.data: Corona Refresca MAS Mango Citrus Spiked Tropical Cocktail is a premium flavored malt beverage. Taste the tropics of Mexico with the vibrant, refreshing, and natural mango citrus flavors of these sweet drinks made with malt grains and brewed with minimal fermentation. In larger, 24 oz cans ideal for portability, these Corona Refresca flavorful tropical cocktails contain 251 calories* and 8% alcohol by volume. Each sip of these citrus and mango flavored drinks delivers a crisp finish that is especially enjoyable on a hot day. Perfect for serving at pool parties, backyard barbecues, and other get-togethers with friends, these mango drinks also are great poured into tropical cocktail glasses to enjoy with a special meal. Another premium offering from the Corona beer family, Corona Refresca is MAS tropical celebration you can taste. *Per 12 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 251, Carbs 25.6 grams, Protein 0.2 grams, Fat 0.0 grams. Relax responsibly®. Corona Refresca Mas™ Malt Beverage with Natural Flavors and Certified Colors.  Imported by Crown Imports, Chicago, IL.

description.data: Bud Light Seltzer Black Cherry is an easy drinking hard seltzer with a hint of delicious black cherry flavor. These hard seltzer drinks are made with a unique 5 step filtration process to ensure a clean, refreshing finish with no lingering aftertaste. Thanks to natural carbonation and quality ingredients like sparkling water, real cane sugar and natural cherry flavor, these hard fruit drinks are light, bubbly and made to deliver the most refreshing taste possible. Each serving of Bud Light Seltzer has 100 calories, less than 1 gram of sugar and 2 grams of carbs. These gluten free alcohol drinks have a 5% ABV and are made with no artificial flavors. The slim cans of seltzer are easy to hold, store and transport because of their smaller packaging. Enjoy refreshing black cherry alcohol beverages at outdoor gatherings and parties with friends, or enjoy a hard flavored seltzer during any occasion. description.data:
Looking for answers?
What does it taste like?
Seltzer.
Does it taste like seltzer or beer?
Seltzer.
Is there any Bud Light in it?
No.
But can I drink it when I’d typically drink Bud Light?
Yes.
Like, can I drink it at a tailgate?
Yes.
In my garage?
Yes.
At 40.696252, -76.235543?
If you do, take a picture.
Would it be weird to have it at a BBQ?
No.
Is it gluten free?
Yes.
Also, what's a gluten?
Good question.
Is it for non-beer people?
Yes.
Is it only for non-beer people?
No.
If I buy black cherry, will mango be mad?
Maybe.
How many should I buy?
How many can you carry?
Does it turn my beer fridge into a seltzer fridge?
A true philosophical quandary.
Is it still okay to say dilly dilly?
We'll get back to you on that.

description.data: An escape from the conventional, Funky Buddha Premium Hard Seltzer Tropical Flavors Variety Pack is an enlightened spiked sparkling water. This spiked seltzer mix pack contains four different tropical-flavored seltzers, including Smooth Pineapple Coconut, Bright Starfruit, Vibrant Strawberry Papaya, and Exotic Passionfruit Dragonfruit. Featuring natural flavors and made from real stuff like cane sugar and agave syrup for a crisp, clean taste, this gluten-free spiked seltzer water offers full, bold flavor without artificial sweeteners. Enjoy a Funky Buddha seltzer can while working in the garden or taking a brisk walk on the beach. Each 12 oz can of hard sparkling water with alcohol contains 90 to 100 calories* and just 2 grams of sugar, so you truly can lighten the funk up with Funky Buddha. *Per 12 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 100, Carbs 3 grams, Protein 0 grams, Fat 0 grams (Smooth Pineapple Coconut, Bright Starfruit); Calories 90, Carbs 2 grams, Protein 0 grams, Fat 0 grams (Passionfruit Dragonfruit); Calories 100, Carbs 2 grams, Protein 0 grams, Fat 0 grams (Vibrant Strawberry Papaya). Get Funky Responsibly. Funky Buddha Premium Hard Seltzer with Natural Flavors. Funky Buddha Brewery, Oakland Park, FL.

description.data: Peach-A- Rita Please! Ripe, sweet, and tart peach flavors you love paired with the tangy margarita you also love. There is always room for more flavor in your life. namePublicShort.data: Saint Archer is a lifestyle brand rooted in Southern California culture; skate, surf, music, and the outdoors. We art built on quality, grit, and the legitimacy that separates us from competitors. Our new line of premium 6 pack Vodka Sodas were crafted as a reflection of who our customers are, and the life they lead. Driven by passion and commitment to creativity, we apply our award winning brewing experience and sought after brand, to a new category of innovative refreshment. At only 100 calories, zero sugar, and gluten free - you can feel good about every sip, no matter where your journey takes you.

description.data: Saint Archer is a lifestyle brand rooted in Southern California culture; skate, surf, music, and the outdoors. We art built on quality, grit, and the legitimacy that separates us from competitors. Our new line of premium 6 pack Vodka Sodas were crafted as a reflection of who our customers are, and the life they lead. Driven by passion and commitment to creativity, we apply our award winning brewing experience and sought after brand, to a new category of innovative refreshment. At only 100 calories, zero sugar, and gluten free - you can feel good about every sip, no matter where your journey takes you.

brandHighlight.data: In 1824 John Haig established Scotland's oldest single grain distillery, Cameronbridge, and set out to pioneer the art of producing Grain Whisky in continuous Coffey and Stein stills, a process which would go on to provide the foundations for the success of the modern Scotch Whisky industry. The rise of Single Grain Scotch Whisky to the heights of single malts has been both predicted and eagerly anticipated by spirits experts; we are proud to be at the forefront of this movement.

description.data: Celebrate any occasion with Haig Club Clubman Ginger Lime & Soda ready-to-drink canned cocktail. Featuring the wonderfully smooth taste of Haig Club Clubman Single Grain Scotch Whisky expertly mixed with fiery root ginger and finished with a twist of lime flavor, this cocktail offers an effortlessly delicious way to relax or celebrate. Simply enjoy chilled straight from the can or pour in a glass over ice with your favorite garnish. Includes one 5.8% alc./vol. 12 fl oz slim can of Haig Club Clubman Ginger Lime & Soda. Please drink responsibly.

namePublicLong.data: Haig Club Clubman Ginger Lime & Soda, 12 fl oz

tastingNotesText.data: Taste: Fiery root ginger mixed with the light smooth taste of Haig Club Clubman Single Grain Scotch Whisky | Finish: Finished with a twist of lime flavor

text.data: One 12 fl oz slim can of Haig Club Clubman Ginger Lime & Soda

Effortless way to celebrate any occasion, big or small

pictureTypeCode.description: An Optimized Hero Image type is to support retail, consumers, distributors and foodservice operators in completing their online sites. These images will assist consumers to identify specific information about the products they are purchasing. The image is a representation of a real world product, built specifically for use on larger screens that may differ from a standard pack shot, but that maintains the majority of the physical pack’s key elements of design, shape and color, and is therefore recognizable on a digital shelf.

description.data:
Looking for answers?
Does it taste like seltzer or beer? Seltzer. Is there any Bud Light in it? No. Is it gluten free? Yep. Is it free-free? No sorry. Is it for non-beer people? Yep. Is it only for non-beer people? No. Which one should I try first, lemonade or tea? Surprise yourself. Do I have to be classy if i choose tea? Pinky out. Can I try them mixed together? Absolutely. Are they delicious mixed together? Only one way to find out.

brandHighlight.data: Inspired by the loyal 9 of the American revolution. Loyal 9 cocktails rebel against fake ingredients – but always with a sense of humor!

description.data: An easy to drink cocktail right at your fingertips, Loyal 9 Lemonade Vodka Cocktail will bring new flavors to your day. With a sophisticated and refreshing taste, this stand out drink will become a crowd favorite. Rebelling against fake ingredients, this cocktail is unlike the rest made with real lemons and vodka at a 9% ABV. This cocktail is best enjoyed chilled or in a glass over ice. Real vodka. Real fruit. Real flavor. Includes one 9% alc./vol. 12 fl oz can. Please enjoy responsibly!

description.data: Ahora ("ah-OR-ah") Paloma Tequila Seltzer combines Mexican tequila with crisp and bubbly seltzer, offering a delicious drink experience with delightful grapefruit and lime flavors. A canned seltzer made with tequila blanco from Mexico, real fruit juice**, crisp seltzer water, and a hint of agave for just a touch of sweetness, this spiked sparkling water contains 130 calories* and 6% alcohol by volume. Tequila meets seltzer in this unique twist on alcoholic sparkling water. Bold and perfectly balanced, this paloma tequila hard seltzer in convenient 12 oz slim cans is a great drink for anywhere, anytime – like ahora (that means "now"). *Per 12 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 130, Carbs 3.2 grams, Protein 0.1 grams, Fat 0 grams, Sugar 2.9 grams. **3% juice from concentrate. brandHighlight.data: CIROC set itself apart as an Ultra-Premium vodka distilled from fine French grapes, rather than grain. Distilled 5 times at the historic Distillerie de Chanceneaux in the Charente region of France, the process is inspired by over a century of wine-making expertise and craftsmanship. From its inception, CIROC was destined to be a spirit known for luxury and elegance. The vodka of choice for those who seek more from their spirits experience.

description.data: A tasty spiked seltzer water inspired by classic margarita flavors, Corona Hard Seltzer Seltzerita Classic Lime is an alcoholic sparkling water that offers the boldness of a margarita balanced by the lightness of a sparkling seltzer. Experience this fruit-flavored seltzer water that invites you to enjoy the moment, offering a day-at-the-beach feeling wherever you happen to be. A bottled seltzer made with natural flavors and a splash of real Mexican lime juice and sweetened with real agave and cane sugar, this gluten-free* Corona beverage features the bold and refreshing flavor of lime. Enjoy a lime hard seltzer poolside with this unique twist on the margarita from the makers of Corona Extra Beer. Bright flavors meet beach vibes with Corona Hard Seltzer. *Per 7 fl. oz. serving of average analysis: Calories 80, Carbs 2 grams, Protein 0 grams, Fat 0 grams. Relax responsibly®. Corona® Hard Seltzer Seltzerita™.  Hard Seltzer with Natural Flavors and a Splash of Real Juice.  Imported by Crown Imports, Chicago, IL.
